You may use an HB pencil for any diagrams or graphs. <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 464, 808, 481]]<|/det|> - Write your name, centre number and candidate number in the boxes at the top of the page. <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 480, 565, 497]]<|/det|> - Write your answer to each question in the space provided. <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 497, 482, 512]]<|/det|> - Do not use an erasable pen or correction fluid. <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 512, 363, 528]]<|/det|> - Do not write on any bar codes. <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 526, 325, 543]]<|/det|> - You may use a calculator. <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 542, 581, 559]]<|/det|> - You should show all your working and use appropriate units. <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 556, 672, 575]]<|/det|> - Take the weight of 1.0 kg to be 9.8 N (acceleration of free fall \(=9.8 \mathrm{~m} / \mathrm{s}^{2}\) ). <|ref|>title<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 603, 217, 617]]<|/det|> INFORMATION <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 618, 388, 635]]<|/det|> - The total mark for this paper is 80 . <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 634, 730, 651]]<|/det|> - The number of marks for each question or part question is shown in brackets [ ] .
